then you shall <S%H6026>delight<s%> yourself in <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and I will make you to <S%H7392>ride<s%> on the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and I will <S%H398>feed<s%> you with the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> your <S%H1>father:<s%>" for the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has spoken <S%H1696>it.<s%>
